column4: All*, Totem, has a bad picture compared to vlc. I had just noticed it per the fresh install of heron. I tried to install totem-xine and set the default backend gstreamer to totem-xine via, sudo update-alternatives --config totem. To no avail. The picture is still bad even though totem does show it is using different codecs.
How would I use the vlc codecs, and or, anyone know another route to improve totem picture
Well, I generally use totem because you can simply remove the controls. :) That is a biggie to me hehe
F11 doe nothing
hm... I'll look into it in a sec
I appreciate your help
try right clicking on the video and selecting FullScreen
pilkington, any of the 3 will work
Yea, that works, but I like to keep the vid small without controls while I'm working.
And the like
oh, you need a skin
Sounds like a route I need to go. Shame I can't get totem working %100
I can get VLC controlless, in a sec
got it.  you need to go into the preferences window, under Interfaces, Main Interface, WXWidgets (near the bottom) and turn off Embed Video in Interface
Haha, yea. Just found that out :)
pilkington, you need to wait for it to install the files
Thanks, that does help
did it say "installation complete"?
no problem
